node.title: Turns out? I'm not an asshole
node.excerpt: Shit I’m old. I turned a grand age of 34 on Monday. But let’s not panic, I’m not frail and fatigued yet!

node.title: The appalling state of Caramel in this country
node.excerpt: As some of you may already know, I have a vendetta: The quality of caramel slices in this country is appalling.

node.title: My Mother, My Mother and Me
node.excerpt: Well, that was one hell of a week. My work days were long hours, but it was, frustratingly, a lot of waiting around. Oddly, I’d rather be working hard for 14 hours than trying to sort out scheduling and logistics.

node.title: Trying out video: Life Update
node.excerpt: Well, rather than writing I opted for a video update this time. 4 minutes of it!

node.title: I got Tonsillitis
node.excerpt: I came back from training in Auckland last week feeling awful - sweaty, sore, weak and disoriented. It had been slowly escalating during the week, but after my flight back it was destroying me.

node.title: Uninteresting
node.excerpt: Well, training here is going well! It's intimidating to understand a big and complicated machine, but the boss man Karl ensures us it's not as bad as it looks. It's all sensors and belts and mechanicalness.
